page.description: Update a named ranges contents using a delimited text and an optional range.
page.prototype: UpdateNamedRangeText as L(namedrange as C,values as C[, separator as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.UpdateNamedRangeText("HISCORE","350")
